评论详情: The fabric is soft, cozy, and warm, but not overly warm.  I am 5'8" with a 41.5" bust.  The large size in this top fits me beautifully and is very flattering.  The sleeves are long enough for me and the hemline covers most of my behind.  If I get a little too warm during an active day, I just unzip the zipper.  Perfect!  I like this top so much I ordered a second one in another color.  Great top!

评论概述: Excellent fleece lined top for real women
评论详情: I was so happy with this top that I just ordered the blue one also.  I wanted the  “black-2” color but they  were out.  It has a nice fleece on the inside and is perfect for cooler temps.  The color is exactly as shown.  The quality is excellent.  The sleeves are not cut too slim like some sporty tops, but  more comfortable for slightly larger arms.  It also has room over the hips and is not too snug.  Washes excellently.  It is a very attractive fit for curvy women and they will appreciate it.  Straight body types may not like this cut because it has ample hip room.  I also ordered the black with the thinner cloth, but it was a totally different fit and too thin like nylon. Had to return it.  The other three are excellent and I am very happy.

The material is a little weird.. you cannot put it in the dryer.  The inside is very soft and the shirt is very warm.  The bust is tight.  I normally wear a 10-12 but bought large after reading the size chart and it is still tight. (34C).  The hips have a flair so there is extra width.  The style makes it OK.  The sleeves are perfect, especially the length.  The length is perfect - it covers just right.

Light weight . I like the length. It is a little longer than a tee shirt. I like that. I have washed it several times and looks great. Perfect for working out in cooler weather. I ordered an al because I like it a little bit to work out in . Fit as I expected. I could have gotten a large and it would have fit perfect.

I'm 5'2" & weigh 112 & bought a size large to make sure the shirt would fit in the bust & also be long enough to cover the rear.....but it is way too flared @ the hemline. This shirt is very warm, soft, & comfortable. The inside is a nice fleece & the outside has more of a 'slick' feel to it.
I purchased all the color! I wish they have more. Very comfortable. It covers the hips! Great for fall.

Good material and looks well built. However- I usually wear an XL, but ordered a 2x because I wanted it wear it with Nogo pants without being form fitting.  It felt like a large. If it wanted to wear it as a base layer, this might work. But cannot use it as an insulation layer or an everyday top.  If you order this, go at least 3 sizes 5up unless you want a tight fir, then go at least 1-2 sizes up.
Perfect lighweight, 1/4 zip fleece. A soft, thin layer of fleece on the inside provides warmth without bulk.  Like the slim fit and the color is great.

This is nicely made and cozy warm but I wish it came in a petite length.  If it was available in a petite length, I’d buy more colors and wear them every day to save on heating bills.  As is, it will work over fleece tights to walk the dog with modest coverage on cool days so I’m keeping it.
Good quality but runs small… I had to return

I liked the material, seems like it would be great for cold- weather golf, but the fit is odd. I'm pretty solidly a M in most things (5'4",140, 38C), but this was *very* tight in the chest and upper belly, but then it's also quite long (below hips) and flares out at the bottom. So I think it would be good for a tall person with less on top and more on the bottom, but not for me. I got the black one that's a little heathery, not the slick one. It's really more of a dark charcoal gray, which was just what I was looking for. Too bad.

评论概述: Red color option has a gray undertone.
评论详情: This fits pretty snugly around the chest and flares quite a bit at the hip. It has nice smooth, light fleece next to the body with  smooth outside materail. In size large, the sleeves and overall length are pretty long but I seem to have a shorter arm length, so I am accustomed to managing that in non-petite sizes. I may re-evaluate once it is washed and dried.
Bought in green and blue.  Nice  light weight but warm tops.  Washed nicely.  I hung it to dry.
Love this jacket! I wore it all winter and would have given it 5 stars if only it had at least one pocket.

评论概述: Love the stretch and warmth without being heavy
评论详情: I was pleasantly surprised by this pullover. I’ve been looking for something like this. I liked the amount of stretch and warmth without being bulky and heavy.

I wanted a 1/4 zip that was alittle longer......no one needs to see me in leggings without the lower half covered:)I normally would order a Large or Xlarge so it would be long enough, the xlarge was great, good coverage past the butt but not too long like a tunic and fit slimming for an extra large.  Sometimes an xlarge looks big, this had nice tapered sides with the length.  Perfect if you want your butt area covered with leggings.
I'm not a fan of polyester fabric yet this jacket is very comfortable and flattering. I like that the jacket covers below the belly area. I like to wear leggings or yoga pants with this jacket.
Its soo cozy & comfortable.
I am 5'11" and this is a great length. I bought it and had our school team name embroidered on it at a local shop (I'm a coach). Very flattering cut as well.
This top is great! I love the look of it and the feel of the fabric. For a relatively thin weight, it is very warm. A great layering piece under a coat or wear it separately.

I like this shirt. Good cooling material, has washed well, looks nice, flattering blue color. The only thing is this shirt runs BIG. I am a womens large on most everything but a wear medium in unisex t-shirts. I got large and it is very loose, long in the torso, and baggie slightly long sleeves. It is supposed to be fitted and seems to be but hard to tell. I still liked it and kept it. Worth the price
This is a great color, washed well, fit good. It is perfect for a cool day. I liked it so much I bought a second one.

Arrived quickly and as advertised.  Love the micro-fleece lining as it is usually too cool in the Pilates studio for me.

This top is so comfortable, great for traveling. Perfect for the jogger pants I matched it with. Love the light fleece lining.

评论概述: Top is tight. Bottom is huge.

The material is cozy and warm and I love the length. I’m 5’6” and it covers my bum. It is a slim fit, so if you’re round around the middle, it might feel a little snug. If you have a straight or hourglass shape, it will fit well. Sizing was accurate.

I love the shoulders on this top. They are very flattering unlike droopy squared off ones but the material was stiffer than expected. It has stretch but didn't feel as comfortable as you would think as far as moving all around. It felt tight in the chest and under arm area. The quality is nice, you just need the right body shape like the models.

I usually wear medium but sized up to large to accommodate a thermal layer if needed this winter. However, this is a slightly thicker fabric and warm. Feels great. Cozy and soft. I like the shape. Slightly fitted and flattering. I ordered two in different colors.
Seems to be very well made!  I love how the collar zips up higher on the neck if it’s cool out. The fit is very flattering. Very figure fitting. It has a lot of stretch in it.

评论概述: Stylish, comfy, warm (without being too hot)
评论详情: Just like the short-sleeve Miusey tops, this is a keeper!  Stylish, comfy, warm (without being too hot) for running in winter.  It is long enough to cover one's bum when wearing yoga pants.  Washes up nicely (I hang on a hanger to dry), holds its color, shape and doesn't shrink.  What I like best is the sleeves are not tight around my upper arms, which I have found with a lot of other tops.  The only improvements I could wish for to make this a perfect top are thumb holes and a cloth zipper "cap."

Flattering A-line fit and excellent material for the price.  I was amazed and have ordered two other colors.  I never write reviews and I seldom order a second product.  This is a 3 season pullover.  Too warm for summer.
Great fit, just right for cooler weather without being bulky. Really like this shirt.
